sentences.english: Yes, we must suppose the faults of the niece to have been those of the aunt;
sentences.chinese: 是的，我们必须把侄女的过错视为婶母的过错。

sentences.english: ''We thought she was dead,'' the aunt said through a shower of tears.
sentences.chinese: “我们以为她死了，”婶母说着，泪如雨下。

sentences.english: He has (got) an aunt and an uncle.
John robbed his old aunt blind for years .
sentences.chinese: 约翰多年来骗取了他婶母很多钱。

definition: wife of mother's brother/aunt/maternal uncle's wife
older brother's wife/sister-in-law/(polite address to a younger married woman) sister
wife of father's elder brother/aunt/(polite form of address for a woman who is about the age of one's mother)/CL:個|个[ge4]
great uncle/grandfather's younger brother/husband's father's younger brother
wife of paternal grandfather's younger brother
wife of older male cousin via male line
(old) dowager/old lady (title for the mother of a noble or an official)
mother's sister's husband/husband of mother's sister
